description: The ExaSAT framework automates the extraction of parameterized performance models directly from source code using compiler analysis. Its parameterized analytic model enables quantitative evaluation of a broad range of hardware design trade-offs and software optimizations on a variety of different performance metrics, with a primary focus on data movement as a metric. ExaSAT analysis provides insights in the hardware and software tradeoffs and lays the groundwork for exploring a more targeted set of design points using cycle-accurate architectural simulators and emulators.
name: ExaSat: An Exascale Static Analysis Tool (ExaSat) v1.0
